cetus.hir
Class AnnotationStatement

java.lang.Object
  cetus.hir.Statement
      cetus.hir.AnnotationStatement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Annotatable, Printable, Traversable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class AnnotationStatement
extends Statement

AnnotationStatement is used for stand-alone annotations in executable code section, e.g., in a CompoundStatement.

Method Detail

defaultPrint

public static void defaultPrint(AnnotationStatement s,
                                java.io.PrintWriter o)
Prints this annotation statement. There is nothing to print since the annotation statement is just a place holder.

Parameters:
s - the annotation statement to be printed.
o - the target print writer.

setClassPrintMethod

public static void setClassPrintMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method m)
Sets the class print method with the given method.
